content:
I just published a new release of ComponentizeJS, version 0.18.0. This release pulls in a bunch of good changes from StarlingMonkey, adds a small new CLI tool (run npx componentize-js to access), and makes resulting components debuggable with a VSCode extension, which itself will get a pre-release soon

@bytecodealliance/componentize-js
ESM -> WebAssembly Component creator, via a SpiderMonkey JS engine embedding. Latest version: 0.18.0, last published: a few seconds ago. Start using @bytecodealliance/componentize-js in your project by running `npm i @bytecodealliance/componentize-js`. There are 5 other projects in the npm registry using @bytecodealliance/componentize-js.
GitHub - tschneidereit/StarlingMonkey at vscode-debugging-extension
The StarlingMonkey JS runtime. Contribute to tschneidereit/StarlingMonkey development by creating an account on GitHub.
